      • Transaction

        public Transaction(double value,
                   java.lang.String dateS,
                   long catID,
                   boolean done,
                   boolean cash)
        Initialize a transaction instance
        Parameters:
        value - Transaction's value
        dateS - Transaction's date as "yyyy-MM-dd"
        catID - Category id of the transaction
        done - True if the transaction already happened and false otherwise
        cash - True if it was payed with money and false otherwise

      • compareTo

        @NonNull
public int compareTo(@NonNull
                              Transaction o)
        Compares 2 transaction verifying if the value is the same
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Transaction>
        Parameters:
        o - Transactions to compare with
        Returns:
        Returns negative if this.value < o.getValue, 0 if they are equals and true if this.value > o.getValue()

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Verify if 2 Transactions are the same comparing the category ID and the Description. To be used in incomes and fixed expenses
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - Transaction object to compare with
        Returns:
        Returns true if they are equals and false otherwise
